scripts.setup: npm install && npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix infra install
scripts.dev: npm run dev:dynamo && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm --prefix infra run cdk -- bootstrap --profile desire-dev && npm --prefix infra run cdk -- synth --profile desire-dev && npm --prefix infra run cdk -- deploy --profile desire-dev
scripts.destroy: npm --prefix infra run cdk -- destroy --profile desire-dev
